reason: The text expresses a strong emotional connection between the Holocaust and Israel, with phrases like 'Any attack on the State of Israel would be as intolerable as the resumption of the crematory ovens and gas chambers of Auschwitz...' and '...it will never return (Ã§ela ne se reproduira)'. The tone is one of alarm and urgency, emphasizing the importance of preserving Israel as a guarantor of Jewish safety.
